name: Udte Chappal
description:
How dare those rapscallions disturb Pammi Auntie's Chai time!
They would be punished by the wrath and Auntie's arsenal of Chappals.

Controls:
Arrow Keys to Move
Z to Interact and Shoot
R to Restart the game if finished

Made in GameMaker Studio for WIT+LeanIn IIITD Game Dev Hackathon in under 24 hours.

Programming and Art done by me.
Audio taken from freesound.org and opengameart.org

NOTE:
The HTML build is a little buggy, this is a problem with multiple gamemaker functions so try to use the windows executable over the web game
